HE BLEW THE HORN WHILE THE PILOT USED HIS RADIO TO WARN ANY OTHER PERSONNEL IN THE AREAOF THE IMPENDING COLLISION. THE PETTIBONE AND BUGGY THEN IMPACTED WITH FLAT 28.
